The MS: 13 gang was formed in Los Angeles in the 1980s, years before Barack Obama became president.
The FBI has been using the estimate of 1: 000 MS-13 members since 2006, indicating that the claim of recent significant growth is not supported by available data.
The origins and spread of MS: 13 date back much earlier than Obama's presidency, contradicting the claim that his administration allowed the gang to form in cities across the country.
Multiple reports and sources confirm tha: 13 was a result of El Salvadoran immigrants banding together for protection against Mexican-American gangs, rather than a consequence of weak immigration policies during the Obama administration.
